info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 8:47PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Schenectady, southeastern Warren, eastern Saratoga, Washington and northern Rensselaer Counties through 930 PM EDT... At 846 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from West Glens Falls to 7 miles southeast of Saratoga Springs to near Colonie. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Schenectady, Troy, Clifton Park, Rotterdam, Saratoga Springs, Glens Falls, Hudson Falls, Mechanicville, Hoosick Falls, Salem, Niskayuna, Fort Edward, Granville, Hartford, Waterford, Cambridge, Greenwich, Round Lake, Glens Falls North and Country Knolls. This includes the following highways... Interstate 890 between exits 7 and 8. Interstate 87 between exits 8A and 10, and between exits 16 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
